MochaMethod

Howdy? I'm Bryce Crist, a programmer, QA testing technician and release manager, musician, and cook.

I have been programming in a variety of languages for nearing 5 years now.
In that time, I have become comfortable with a large number of technologies, libraries, and services including AWS Elastic Search, SQS, and Lambda, Twilio call and messaging features, Atlassian products such as Jira and Confluence, and many more.
